title: An extreme Gradient Boosting (XGBoost) Trees approach to Detect and Identify Unlawful Insider Trading (UIT) TransactionsThis manuscript was presented at the 14th International Conference on Data Science, Technology and Applications (DATA 2025), Bilbao, Spain, June 10–12, 2025. https://data.scitevents.org/Home.aspx?y=2025. .
